attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I protest at the way arms are delivered to israel in order to murder palestinians on there own land you must stop supporting Israel especially when they break all UN charters and do not get punished. Israel broke the peace treaty last November but nothing was done WHY. Pleae stop suppoorting the uSA and stop sending weapons to Israel, they are trying to live out the bible which is not the word of God (Evidence Based)

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
